Translations.Text: (Zhe shi) yi zhang jing, wo jiang shi ta, bing yi ta wei dingzhi, qie zai qizhong jiang shi xuduo mingxian de jixiang, yibian nimen jiyi
Yin fu he jian fu, nimen yingdang ge da yibai bian. Nimen buyao wei lianmin ta lia er jianmian an la de xingfa, ruguo nimen quexin an la he wei ri. Jiao yi huo xinshi, jianshi ta lia de shouxing
Jian fu zhide qu yin fu, huo qu duoshenjiao tu; yin fu zhide jia jian fu, huo jia duoshenjiao tu, xindao zhe bude qu ta
Fan gaofa zhenjie de funu, er buneng ju chu si ge nanzi wei jianzheng zhe, nimen yingdang ba mei geren da bashi bian, bingqie yongyuan buke jieshou tamen de jianzheng. Zhe deng ren shi zuiren
Yihou huiguo zi xin zhe chuwai, yin wei an la que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Fan gaofa ziji de qizi, chu benren wai bie wu jianzheng, ta de zhengju shi zhi an la fashi si ci, zhengming ta que shi shuo shihua de
di wu ci shi shuo: Ta ganshou an la de zuzhou, ruguo ta shuohuangyan
Ta yao bimian xingfa, bixu zhi an la fashi si ci, zhengming ta que shi shuo huangyan de
di wu ci shi shuo:“Ta ganshou tianqian, ruguo ta shi shuo shihua de.”
Jiaruo wu an la suo ci nimen de enhui he renci, ruguo an la bushi zhi she de, bushi zhi rui de……

zaoyao zhe que shi nimen zhong de yi huo ren. Nimen buyao yiwei zhe jian shi duiyu nimen shi youhai de, qishi shi youyi de. Tamen zhong de mei geren, ge yingdang shou tasuo mouqiu de zui'e; tamen zhong de zuikui, ying shou zhongda de xingfa
dang nimen tingjian yaoyan de shihou, xinshi hexin nu dui ziji de jiao bao, weihe buzuo shanyi de caixiang, bingqie shuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de yaoyan ne?”
Tamen weihe bu ju chu si ge jianzheng zhe zhengming zhe jian shi ne? Tamen meiyou ju chu si ge jianzheng zhe, suoyi, zai an la kan lai tamen shi shuo huang de
Ruo wu an la zai jinshi he houshi suo ci nimen de enhui he renci, nimen bi yin feibang er zaoshou zhongda de xingfa
Dangshi, nimen daotingtushuo, wuzhi er wangyan, nimen yiwei zhe shi yi jian xiaoshi; zai an la kan lai, que shi yi jian dashi
Dang nimen tingjian huangyan de shihou, nimen weihe bu shuo: Women bu gai shuo zhe zhong hua, zansong an la, chaojue wanwu! Zhe shi zhongda de wumie
An la quangao nimen yongyuan buyao zaishuo zheyang dehua, ruguo nimen shi xinshi
An la wei nimen chanming yi qie jixiang. An la shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de
Fan ai zai xinshi zhi jian chuanbo choushi de ren, zai jinshi he houshi, bi shou tongku de xingfa. An la zhidao, nimen que bu zhidao
Ruo wu an la suo ci nimen de enhui he renci, ruguo an la bushi ren'ai de, bushi zhi ci de,(ta zao jiu chengfa nimenle)
